name: SinchRTC
summary: Sinch provides voice calling, video calling, and instant-messaging.
description:
The Sinch iOS SDK provides real-time communication features and makes
it easy to add high-definition voice and video calling, and instant-messaging
to iOS applications.

* High-Definition Voice Calling
* High-Definition Video Calling
* Instant Messaging
* Group Messaging
* Sinch's cloud service as backend
